basic.description: Among the topics covered are: similarity and canonical forms; non-negative matrices and Perron-Frobenius theory (with applications to probability theory and Markov chains); matrix differential equations and stability theory; estimation of eigenvalues using Gersgorin's theorem and related inequalities. (Offered jointly with MATH-405*.) Three term-hours, fall or winter; lectures.
basic.subject: MATH
basic.title: Applications Of Matrix Algebra
